<h3 align="center">Instro - Full-Stack website for song instrumentals.</h3>

  <p align="center">
    This music instrumental website was built using Next.js, React.js, Typescript, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, Supabase and PostgreSQL.
    <br />
    <a href="https://github.com/dontrellthedeveloper/instro-nextjs-sql"><strong>Explore the docs »</strong></a>
    <br />
    <br />
    <a href="https://instro.digital/">View Demo</a>
    ·
    <a href="https://github.com/dontrellthedeveloper/instro-nextjs-sql">Report Bug</a>
    ·
    <a href="https://github.com/dontrellthedeveloper/instro-nextjs-sql">Request Feature</a>
  </p>
</div>

&nbsp;
&nbsp;
&nbsp;
&nbsp;

* [![Vercel][Vercel]][Vercel-url]

<!-- USAGE EXAMPLES -->
## Usage

This is a website designed for song instrumentals. Creating an account gives you the ability to upload songs. If you're looking for a particular song, use the search functionality. If you really like an instrumental, add it to your favorites. 

[![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot]](https://instro.digital/)


[![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot2]](https://instro.digital/)




[![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot3]](https://instro.digital/)


_For more examples, please take a look at the [application](https://instro.digital/)_



<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>



<!-- GETTING STARTED -->


## Clone Project


To get a local copy up and running follow the steps below.


<!--
### Prerequisites

This is an example of how to list things you need to use the software and how to install them.
* npm
  ```sh
  npm install --legacy-peer-deps
  ```

-->

### Installation

1. Clone the repo
   ```sh
   git clone https://github.com/dontrellthedeveloper/instro-nextjs-sql
   ```

2. Install NPM packages
   ```sh
   npm install 
   ```
3. Enter values in `.env` file
   ```js
    NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL={supabase url}
    NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY={next supabase anon key}
    SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY={supabase service role key}

   ```

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>
